rules: Draw a card and follow its rule

A.title: Waterfall
A.desc: Everyone starts drinking. You can't stop until the person to your right stops.

4.title: Floor
4.desc: Everyone touches the floor. Last one drinks.

7.title: Heaven
7.desc: Reach for the sky. Last one drinks.

8.title: Mate
8.desc: Pick a mate. Every time you drink, they drink.

9.desc: Say a word. Go in a circle rhyming. First to mess up drinks.

10.title: Categories

J.title: Rule Master
J.desc: Make a rule that lasts the whole game. Anyone who breaks it drinks.

Q.title: Question Master
Q.desc: Ask someone a question. If they answer without a question, they drink.

K.title: King's Cup
K.desc: Pour some of your drink into the center cup.
